Articles.Content:
True i do like the serise, but i like to older ones more

the user below me dosen't know what curse is

That's true. (What is it?)

The user below is in the forum games too much.

Yep, this is true.

The user below me prefers Jaegers to Kaiju.

Ehm... Nope. Don't know what they are.

The user below me doesn't know it either.

False i do know what those are especially since i just saw Pacific Rim a few days ago(and i do refer Jaegers over Kaiju no matter how awesome Kaijus are)

the user below me is watching star trek the next generation right now

No, but I just saw a Ferengi reference in a different thread.

The user below me prefers rockets to SSTO spaceplanes.

Yup, FAR makes them hard to design, especially when it needs a payload.

The user below me has used an audio system.

True, my speakers are an audio system.

The user below me has witnessed the Aurora Borealis.

Nope. It's quite uncommon in the central europe.

The user below me hasn't been to china.

True. The only time I've left the U.S. was brief 2-hour jaunt through Nogales, Mexico with my grandparents back before 9/11.

The user below me has explored Kerbin in detail.

Hum. Not at all. I think I've explored the Mun far more detailed than Kerbin.

The user below me is practices some kind of martial art.

False, but I used to practice taekwondo... I never realy understood...

The user below me knows one of the most infamous place of the Internet called /b/.

Where do you think the meme I keep using came from?

The user below me is slightly annoyed by my sig.

That's a bit of an understatement...

The user below me has used Kerbal Attachment System to capture an Asteroid.

No, just a tow bar:

The user below me is Chinese :-I

False.

The user below me wishes as well as me that people didn't just put their religion as "Christian" on the census just because they don't know what "atheist" means. (I could rant about this for a while so I'll stop there).

False, i believe that if they aren't sure they should put secularist

the user below me has a drink with him/her/it

True, some beer.

The user below me likes PokÃƒÂ©mon.

Edited May 10, 2014 by Stahlwerk
Typo

No... not at all...

The user below me wishes there was a sarcasm font.

Sure I do.

The user below me wants a better salary.

Nope, I want job satisfaction even at less money

The user below me has recurring dreams.

False, I rarely remember my dreams, and when I do they're all different.

The user below me was born in this century.

False. I was born in the 20th century. When you put it like that, I was born last millennium. Weird.

The user below me has more than one clock in the room they are currently in (a useless yet common phenomenon).

True, but they are each set to different timezone.

The user below me uses Google chrome.

Yep, of course.

The user below me hate this font more than Comic Sans MS.
